summary: Thousands of veterans rely on nursing home care provided or paid for by the Department of Veterans Affairs. Ensuring the quality of care in VA-owned and -operated community living centers has become even more critical with the emergence of COVID-19 . As part of our ongoing review of center care quality, we examined deficiencies in infection prevention and control practices that inspections found at 135...
title: VA Health Care: Community Living Centers Were Commonly Cited for Infection Control Deficiencies Prior to the COVID-19 Pandemic
